definition: without anybody else or anything else, composed or performed by a single voice or instrument, a flight in which the aircraft pilot is unaccompanied, perform a piece written for a single instrument
details:
adverb
- without anybody else or anything else
= synonyms: unaccompanied, alone
adjective
- composed or performed by a single voice or instrument
= example: composed or performed by a single voice or instrument
noun
- a flight in which the aircraft pilot is unaccompanied
- any activity that is performed alone without assistance
- a musical composition for one voice or instrument (with or without accompaniment)
verb
- perform a piece written for a single instrument
- fly alone, without a co-pilot or passengers
